text:
- ( bell rings )
- Let's take five, everybody.
When we have a break on set--
There's no time to rest.
Mic drop.

This next question is perfect
for both of us to answer.

How do you use teamwork
to make the dream work?

Ruth: This reminds me
of the episode

where Sydney and Olive
work together

to start their own
babysitting business.

Two for one
and twice the fun.

And, whoa, did they ever
need to work together.

Because when they didn't,
well, it just didn't work.

You know, my grandpa told me
that "TEAM" stands for...

- I love that.
- Whenever my sister and I

are asked to clean our room,
we put on some music,

and if we do it together,
it doesn't seem like a chore.
That's a great idea. Whoo!

Having a friend
or family member

helps make
everything more fun.

Ava, give me a T.
Give me an E.

Give me an A.
Give me a M.

What does that spell?
What are we?

Keep watching
"Sydney To The Max"...
On Disney Channel.
And that's a break.
